Properties

BindTarget

An alias of BindTo(IBindableDictionary<TKey, TValue>) provided for use in object initializer scenarios. Passes the provided value as the foreign (more permanent) bindable.

IBindableDictionary<TKey, TValue> BindTarget { set; }

Property Value

IBindableDictionary<TKey, TValue>

Methods

BindCollectionChanged(NotifyDictionaryChangedEventHandler<TKey, TValue>, bool)

Bind an action to CollectionChanged with the option of running the bound action once immediately with an Add event for the entire contents of this BindableDictionary<TKey, TValue>.

void BindCollectionChanged(NotifyDictionaryChangedEventHandler<TKey, TValue> onChange, bool runOnceImmediately = false)

Parameters

onChange NotifyDictionaryChangedEventHandler<TKey, TValue>

The action to perform when this BindableDictionary<TKey, TValue> changes.

runOnceImmediately bool

Whether the action provided in onChange should be run once immediately.

BindTo(IBindableDictionary<TKey, TValue>)

Binds self to another bindable such that we receive any values and value limitations of the bindable we bind width.

void BindTo(IBindableDictionary<TKey, TValue> them)

Parameters

them IBindableDictionary<TKey, TValue>

The foreign bindable. This should always be the most permanent end of the bind (ie. a ConfigManager)

GetBoundCopy()

Retrieve a new bindable instance weakly bound to the configuration backing. If you are further binding to events of a bindable retrieved using this method, ensure to hold a local reference.

IBindableDictionary<TKey, TValue> GetBoundCopy()

Returns

IBindableDictionary<TKey, TValue>

A weakly bound copy of the specified bindable.

Exceptions

InvalidOperationException

Thrown when attempting to instantiate a copy bindable that's not matching the original's type.

Events

CollectionChanged

An event which is raised when this IBindableDictionary<TKey, TValue> changes.

event NotifyDictionaryChangedEventHandler<TKey, TValue>? CollectionChanged

Event Type

NotifyDictionaryChangedEventHandler<TKey, TValue>
